thread.title: Group affiliated with Mitch McConnell launches $3 million in Obamacare repeal and replace ads
thread.title_full: Group affiliated with Mitch McConnell launches $3 million in Obamacare repeal and replace ads

title: Group affiliated with Mitch McConnell launches $3 million in Obamacare repeal and replace ads
text:
Group affiliated with Mitch McConnell launches $3 million in Obamacare repeal and replace ads One political advocacy group is making their Obamacare message loud and clear.
The group One Nation, who has ties to Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell, announced they be running a series of ads across nine states to emphasize both repealing and replacing, reports Axios .
Protests for and against Obamacare 

The television ads will set One Nation back $3 million. The group said they hope to target vulnerable Democratic senators in nine battleground states. The ads highlight what they call the failings of Obamacare.
SEE ALSO: The Trump administration just proposed massive changes to Obamacare 
The group is also sending a message to conservative hardliners, specifically the Freedom Caucus who wants to repeal the Affordable Care Act first without a replacement. They're arguing that the repeal first demands go against what the public wants
